pileorface.answer:
**What do you want to play ? `pile` or `face` ?`** 
*:one: Pile 
:two: Face*

noargsembed.title: Hi to the welcome message configurator
noargsembed.desc:
`{prefix}setwelcome currentsetting`
**Allows you to see the current settings**
`{prefix}setwelcome setting`
**Change the welcome message settings**
`{prefix}setwelcome on/off`
**Enable or disable the welcome message**

currentsetting.title: Current Settings for {server}

embed1.title: Welcome message configurator (step 1/3)
embed1.desc:
**Please send channel in which the welcome messages will be sent !**
```
Example: #welcome-users
```
 
*Write under this message & `cancel` for exit process*

embed2.title: Welcome message configurator (step 2/3)
embed2.desc:
**Please send the welcome message that will be sent when a user arrives !**
```
Example: Hi {user} :wave:, welcome to {server_name}
```
 
`{user}`** Returns user mentions**
`{user_name}` **Returns user username**
`{server_name}` **Returns the name of server**
`{server_membercount}` **Returns the number of users on the server** 
*Write under this message & `cancel` for exit process*

embed3.title: Welcome message configurator (step 3/3)
embed3.desc:
**Do you want to enable the welcome message in image? ?** Reply with `yes` or `no`
*Write under this message & `cancel` for exit process*

succes.on: <a:succes:809091639300587530> **You have succesfully activated the welcome messages !**
succes.off: <a:succes:809091639300587530> **You have succesfully deactivated the welcome messages !**
succes.modified: <a:succes:809091639300587530> **You have succesfully changed the parameters of the welcome messages

noargsembed.title: Hi to the goodbye message configurator
noargsembed.desc:
`{prefix}setgoodbye currentsetting`
**Allows you to see the current settings**
`{prefix}setgoodbye setting`
**Change the goodbye message settings**
`{prefix}setgoodbye on/off`
**Enable or disable the goodbye message**

currentsetting.title: Current Settings for {server}

embed1.title: Goodbye message configurator (step 1/3)
embed1.desc:
**Please send channel in which the goodbye messages will be sent !**
```
Example: #goodbye-users
```
 
*Write under this message & `cancel` for exit process*

embed2.title: Goodbye message configurator (step 2/3)
embed2.desc:
**Please send the goodbye message that will be sent when a user arrives !**
```
Example: Goodbye {user} :wave:, to {server_name}
```
 
`{user}`** Returns user mentions**
`{user_name}` **Returns user username**
`{server_name}` **Returns the name of server**
`{server_membercount}` **Returns the number of users on the server** 
*Write under this message & `cancel` for exit process*

embed3.title: Goodbye message configurator (step 3/3)
embed3.desc:
**Do you want to enable the goodbye message in image? ?** Reply with `yes` or `no`
*Write under this message & `cancel` for exit process*

succes.on: <a:succes:809091639300587530> **You have succesfully activated the goodbye messaged !**
succes.off: <a:succes:809091639300587530> **You have succesfully deactivated the goodbye messages !**
